FileFormat.FormatDescription: A format that utilizes the cxcal Instrument Digital Interface (MIDI) protocol to record, store, and read sound event instructions such as pitch, tempo, velocity, and sustain. As the file does not contain actual recorded audio, the file size is greatly reduced.

InternalSignature.SignatureNote: <Chunk type>MThd <header length> 32-bit representation of the number 6, followed by <format> 2 bytes (must be 00, 01 or 02); <number of tracks> 2 bytes; and <division>2 bytes; followed by MTrk <track header>
